channel.title: Is there a simple way to get an MD5 Sum of a String?
channel.description:
I don't want any 3rd party packages or anything, I'm just wondering if there's a simple way to get the MD5 sum of a String in Java.
Something in the Java.Security package, maybe?
Like getMD5("Abc123");?
(Yes I've googled, the only thing I found was an overview of the MessageDigest class, which surprisingly held little information of value.)

item.title: Is there a simple way to get an MD5 Sum of a String?
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“k00dr, post:4, topic:136545”][quote author=frank_ link=topic=188072.msg1698214#msg1698214 date=1187987802]
String md5 = new BigInteger(1, MessageDigest.getInstance(“MD5”).digest(myString.getBytes())).toString(16);

that should give you the md5 hash as a hex string
[/quote]

That’s nifty
Now the value is also unsigned and will result in a correct hash.[/quote]

Yaaaaaaay thank you

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a simple way to get an MD5 Sum of a String?

item.title: Is there a simple way to get an MD5 Sum of a String?
item.dc:creator: @k00dr k00dr
item.description:
@k00dr wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:2, topic:136545”]String md5 = new BigInteger(1, MessageDigest.getInstance(“MD5”).digest(myString.getBytes())).toString(16);

that should give you the md5 hash as a hex string[/quote]

That’s nifty
Now the value is also unsigned and will result in a correct hash.

item.title: Is there a simple way to get an MD5 Sum of a String?
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:2, topic:136545”]String md5 = new BigInteger(MessageDigest.getInstance(“MD5”).digest(myString.getBytes())).toString(16);

that should give you the md5 hash as a hex string[/quote]

Thanks, but what package is BigInteger in?

Nvm, I found it

Op, another problem. Whenever it MD5 sums something, it’s always adding a - to the start of the MD5 Sum. Should I just get rid of that using substring or is it a significant part of the MD5 sum?

Read full topic

item.title: Is there a simple way to get an MD5 Sum of a String?
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

String md5 = new BigInteger(MessageDigest.getInstance(“MD5”).digest(myString.getBytes())).toString(16);

that should give you the md5 hash as a hex string
